title: NIST AI Risk Management Framework (AI RMF 1.0)
summary: Establishes a risk management lifecycle for AI systems organized around the Govern, Map, Measure, and Manage functions, emphasizing trustworthy and accountable AI.

title: OECD AI Principles
summary: Recommends AI systems respect human-centered values, transparency, robustness, security, and accountability, with responsible stewardship across the AI lifecycle.

title: UNESCO Recommendation on the Ethics of AI
summary: Global framework emphasizing human rights, inclusiveness, fairness, safety, and sustainability in AI policy and implementation.

title: IEEE Ethically Aligned Design
summary: Guidance for human well-being, transparency, accountability, and privacy in the design and deployment of autonomous and intelligent systems.
